Data.InitialText: What? Its that Ravenclaw prefect Penelope Clearwater said Ginny.
Data.TargetText: Definitely not said George sniggering.

Data.InitialText: Thats who he was writing to all last summer.
Data.TargetText: The Hogwarts Express slowed and finally stopped.

Data.InitialText: Hes been meeting her all over the school in secret.
Data.TargetText: Harry pulled out his quill and a bit of parchment and turned to Ron and Hermione.

Data.InitialText: I walked in on them kissing in an empty classroom one day.
Data.TargetText: This is called a telephone number he told Ron scribbling it twice tearing the parchment in two and handing it to them.

Data.InitialText: He was so upset when she was -- you know - attacked.
Data.TargetText: I told your dad how to use a telephone last summer - hell know.

Data.InitialText: You wont tease him will you? she added anxiously.
Data.TargetText: Call me at the Dursleys okay? I cant stand another two months with only Dudley to talk to.

Data.InitialText: Wouldnt dream of it said Fred who was looking like his birthday had come early.
Data.TargetText: Your aunt and uncle will be proud though wont they? said Hermione as they got off the train and joined the crowd thronging toward the enchanted barrier.

Data.InitialText: Definitely not said George sniggering.
Data.TargetText: When they hear what you did this year? Proud? said Harry.

Data.InitialText: The Hogwarts Express slowed and finally stopped.
Data.TargetText: Are you crazy? All those times I couldve died and I didnt manage it? Theyll be furious.

Data.InitialText: Harry pulled out his quill and a bit of parchment and turned to Ron and Hermione.
Data.TargetText: And together they walked back through the gateway to the Muggle world.

Data.InitialText: This is called a telephone number he told Ron scribbling it twice tearing the parchment in two and handing it to them.
Data.TargetText: THE END
